sentences.sContent: At this location the two roads divaricate.
sentences.sContent_eng: At this location the two roads divaricate.

sentences.sContent: Fruiting pedicels slender or thickened and nearly as wide as fruit, erect, ascending, divaricate , or reflexed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fruiting pedicels slender or thickened and nearly as wide as fruit, erect, ascending, divaricate , or reflexed.
sentences.sCn: 纤细的或加厚和差不多作为宽作为果，直立，上升，极叉开，或反折的果梗。

words.tran: 发散的；分歧的；岔开的（等于divergent）
分歧；分叉；意见不同；分支

trans.tranOther: (esp of branches) to diverge at a wide angle
